p: The transmission is done primarily from person to person. A transmission by aerosols is possible. Rotavirus can survive for several hours on the hands, up to 9 days in aerosols and several tens of days in water at 20Â°C [ AFSSA (French Food Safety Agency), 2007]. Despite this resistance in water, any epidemic related to water has been reported to date for rotavirus ( Singer et al., 2010).
